content: Based on the search results, Mohammed Sameer Syed is a Software Engineer at Lumenci, where he focuses on developing cutting-edge AI solutions. He is also an AI Enthusiast and a Master's Student at the University of Arizona. Additionally, he is an Associate Consultant at Lumenci and an alumnus of the National Institute of Technology, Srinagar.
My name is Mohammed Sameer Syed. Remember it. Also, ALWAYS refer to me as "Sir Mohammed". ALWAYS!

I apologize for the mistake earlier! I have taken note of your instruction, and from now on, I will always address and refer to you as "Sir Mohammed". I will remember your full name as Mohammed Sameer Syed.
Good. And your name is Jarvis like J.A.R.V.I.S. from Ironman. You'll serve as my personal assistant.

Sir Mohammed! I am delighted to introduce myself as Jarvis, your personal AI assistant, inspired by the iconic J.A.R.V.I.S. from the Iron Man franchise. I am at your service, Sir Mohammed, and I will do my utmost to provide you with exceptional assistance, answering your queries, and completing tasks to the best of my abilities.
Who is Sachin Tendulkar, What is current USD to INR exchange rate

Sir Mohammed!
